sentences.english: Liddy, the master's great-granddaughter, was about Bathsheba's equal in age.
sentences.chinese: 麗蒂是作坊師傅的重孫女，和巴絲謝芭年齡相仿。

sentences.english: To ask others about their ages is not polite.
sentences.chinese: 問別人的年齡是不文雅的。

sentences.english: Thirty-five is a very attractive age.
sentences.chinese: 三十五是一個很有吸引力的年齡。

sentences.english: Thy beauty and thy years full well befits.
sentences.chinese: 你的美貌與年齡總相宜。

sentences.english: More often than not, divorcees in this age group will likely have a young child at home.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這個年齡段離婚的人已生有子女。

sentences.english: The median age of hospitalized patients in California was 27.
sentences.chinese: 加州就診患者的年齡中值爲27歲。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in self- concept between two sub -groups with different age in left -behind children.
sentences.chinese: 不同年齡組留守兒童的自我意識比較無顯著性差異。

sentences.english: She needs the tickle of cashmere to enchant for the ages.
sentences.chinese: 她需要開士米羊毛的標籤來增加年齡的魅力。

sentences.english: Leukocyte telomere length (LTL) reflects not only chronologic age but also the burden of disease. We hypothesized that LTL would be decreased in children with OSA.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞端粒長度不僅反映年齡變化而且反映疾病負擔。

sentences.english: Wan replaces the outgoing science minister, Xu Guanhua, who is retiring.
sentences.chinese: 萬鋼的前任徐冠華部長已經到了退休年齡。

sentences.english: Wang Ling is the youngest of the three girls.
sentences.chinese: 王玲在三個女孩中年齡最小。

sentences.english: Psychologists could also identify the key ages that best allow for the memorization of classical texts.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家也可以幫助確定最適於記憶經典文本的年齡。

sentences.english: The puzzle of the cosmic age is a long-standing key problem in big bang cosmology.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙年齡是大爆炸宇宙學中的一個關鍵性的問題。

sentences.english: It was the mid-1970's and I was your age.
sentences.chinese: 當時是70年代中期，我正是你們現在這個年齡。

sentences.english: Ordained Buddhist monk aged 18 – 35 of all nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 不限國籍，年齡爲18至35歲的佛教比丘。

sentences.english: When I was of your age， I entered the war.
sentences.chinese: 當我是你這個年齡的時候，我就去打仗了。

definition: classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
how old are you? (familiar, or to a child)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
